other_tests.date: Initial visit in 2015 and during second visit in December 2020
other_tests.findings: Indicated moderate obstructive pulmonary ventilation dysfunction.
other_tests.changes_over_time: No specific changes over time noted.

other_tests.findings: Showed viscous jelly-like secretions in the tracheal lumen.
Indicated Pneumocystis jirovecii, CMV, and EBV coinfection.
Identified a heterozygous missense mutation in exon 15 of STAT3, confirming AD-HIES diagnosis.

other_tests.date: Initial visit in 2015 and during second visit in December 2020
other_tests.findings: Showed multiple cavitary lesions and bronchiectasis initially; later revealed bilateral multiple bronchiectases, pulmonary bulla, and atelectasis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Described changes in findings from initial visit to second visit, indicating disease progression.
